title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Discover
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Discover              Discover               Lake Mead National Recreation Area has many exciting places to discover, no matter which direction you are coming from. We have provided you with some handy recommendations depending if you are arriving from the North, South, East, or West. No matter which direction you may be arriving from, Lake Mead NRA offers you a wonderful experience with nature.          Discover Lake Mead from Boulder City         If you are exploring Lake Mead National Recreation Area by way of Boulder City, here are some special places to discover.     Download: Fall/Winter/Spring PDF Download: Summer PDF             Discover Lake Mead from the West         If you are exploring Lake Mead National Recreation Area from the west here are some special places to discover.     Download: Fall/Winter/Spring    Download: Summer PDF               Discover Lake Mead from the East          If you are exploring Lake Mead National Recreation Area  by way of Arizona here are some special places to discover.      Download: Lake Mead from the East (PDF)                 Discover Lake Mead from the North          If you are exploring Lake Mead National Recreation Area from the north here are some special places to discover in your own backyard!    Download:Fall/Winter/Spring PDF Download:Summer PDF               Discover Lake Mead from the South         If you are exploring Lake Mead National Recreation Area by way of Laughlin, Nevada and Bullhead City, Arizona here are some special places to discover.
